title: Lungngaihna sual tinreng ten min hual a
lyrics:
Lungngaihna sual tinreng ten min hual a, 
Thihnaa hruai turin, 
Rinnain hnung lam ka hawi kir a, 
Ka Chhandamtu'n mi rawn zawng.

Ka lawm em em a ni, tunah hian, 
Chhandamtu ngilnei tak, hmangaihtu chuan, 
Ka thlarau a chhanhim leh ta.

Lawmna tak mai thinlunga ka neih hi, 
Isua min pek a ni; 
Lei lawmna aia lawmna ropui, 
Van lawmnain ka khat thin.

Beramno, 
Lal lenna tlang ka thlirin, 
Lawmna chuan min hmuak a; 
Thihna Jordan ka kai hunah chuan, 
Van ruai ropui ka kil dawn.
